Package fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.game

Class AbstractShapeUpGame

java.lang.Object
fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.game.AbstractShapeUpGame
Direct Known Subclasses:
ShapeUpGame, ShapeUpGameAdvanced
public abstract class AbstractShapeUpGame
extends java.lang.Object
Represent the operation of the game with all the actions to be done to play one game.

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractShapeUpGame

      public AbstractShapeUpGame​(IBoardVisitor visitor, java.util.List<Player> players, AbstractBoard board)
      Abstract Game's constructor. Sets the round number to 0, and sets up the observable part and parameters.
      Parameters:
      visitor - the game's visitor. Used to calculate the score.
      players - the player's list. The list can contain 2 or 3 players.
      board - the game's board. It can be a rectangular, triangular or circular board.

    • initRound

      public void initRound()
      Initiate a round

      public abstract void playTurn() throws PlayerHandEmptyException, BoardEmptyException
      Throws:
      PlayerHandEmptyException
      BoardEmptyException

    • placeCardRequest

      public PlaceRequestResult placeCardRequest​(PlaceRequest placeRequest)
      Request to place a card from the player hand to a position on the board
      Parameters:
      placeRequest - Which card and where the player want to put it
      Returns:
      if the request is matching the game rules

    • moveCardRequest

      public MoveRequestResult moveCardRequest​(MoveRequest moveRequest)
      * Request to move an existing card from the board to another position
      Parameters:
      moveRequest - player request
      Returns:
      if the card has been moved or not

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard()
      Add a card from the deck to a given player based on its index If the deck is empty, it doesn't add anything to the player.

    • setState

      public void setState​(GameState state)
      Sets the state of the game. Used to update the view.
      Parameters:
      state - the state of the game.

    • nextPlayer

      public void nextPlayer()
      Go to next player in the list. The current player is stocked in the variable currentPlayer.

    • initDeck

      protected void initDeck()
      Add all cards in the deck. There is 18 cards in total.

    • isRoundFinished

      public abstract boolean isRoundFinished()

    • endRound

      public void endRound()
      Add players' scores at the end of the round and increases round index.

    • getPlayers

      public java.util.List<Player> getPlayers()
      Used to get the player's list.
      Returns:
      the player's list.

    • addPropertyChangeListener

      public void addPropertyChangeListener​(java.beans.PropertyChangeListener pcl)
      Add an observer to the game.
      Parameters:
      pcl - the observer. Here, they are game views.

    • removePropertyChangeListener

      public void removePropertyChangeListener​(java.beans.PropertyChangeListener pcl)
      Remove an observer to the game.
      Parameters:
      pcl - the observer. Here, they are game views.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Used to get the current player who is playing his turn.
      Returns:
      the current player.

    • getRoundNumber

      public int getRoundNumber()
      Used to get the current round number. It can be 1, 2, 3 or 4 and 0 before the game starts.
      Returns:
      the round number.
